ygData.subject: Heritrix 3 bytes limit for each seed?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello! We re planning to crawl only limited amount (e g 300M) of data from each seed in a seed list with H3. How is it possible (without making separate jobs

Hello!


We're planning to crawl only limited amount (e g 300M) of data from each 
seed in a seed list with H3. How is it possible (without making separate 
jobs for each seed). I can't find that property in crawler-beans.cxml.


Thanks!
